source.title: Drone photo winners will amaze your eyeballs: From a high-up horseman to a holy river

facts: A solitary horseman stands atop a rocky outcropping in Cappadocia, Turkey.
The image titled 'The Lone Horseman' was taken by the filmmaker based in Germany during winter when snow covers the rocks.
Dennis Schmelz wanted to capture a different perspective of Cappadocia and chose summer for tourists but opted for winter due to his interest in horses on snow-covered ground.
The photo was made possible by using drones, which allowed capturing aerial perspectives that are otherwise unattainable from the ground.
Susanna Scafuri emphasized the importance of carefully calibrating shooting angles for drone photography to achieve spectacular results.
Cornelia Marchis highlighted her interest in photos offering new ways of seeing familiar places and conveying strong information or telling compelling stories through drones.
The Global South countries were represented, with an image from Italy included among the award-winning drone photographs.
'Dhaka City' urban panorama was captured in early morning light by a creative director based in Barcelona during his visit to Bangladesh on April 25, 2024.

Mohammad Shahriar Foisal took the photo 'Traditional Boli Khela', capturing an annual wrestling tournament held since 1909 as a symbol of cultural richness and enduring energy in Chittagong, Bangladesh.

neutral.headline: Aerial Drone Photography Captures Diverse Perspectives from Around the World
neutral.body_html: Drones have opened up new perspectives in photography, capturing images that reveal patterns invisible to ground-level observation. From a solitary horseman on snowy rocks in Turkey to an urban panorama of Dhaka City and the traditional wrestling tournament 'Traditional Boli Khela' held annually since 1909 in Bangladesh, these aerial views offer unique insights into various cultures and environments.

conservative.headline: 'The Lone Horseman' Captivates with Aerial Perspective
conservative.body_html: A filmmaker based in Germany captures 'The Lone Horseman', a striking image of a horseman on snowy rocks, using drones to achieve an aerial perspective that highlights the beauty and uniqueness of Cappadocia's landscape. This method allows for spectacular shots like this one without disturbing local wildlife or tourists.

liberal.headline: 'Dhaka City' Urban Panorama Reveals the Vibrant Heart of Bangladesh
liberal.body_html: A creative director based in Barcelona captures 'Dhaka City', an urban panorama that showcases the bustling life and cultural richness of Dhaka, Bangladesh. The photo taken during early morning light on April 25, 2024, emphasizes a delicate balance between chaos and order in this vibrant city.
